name: Operation: Flop the Play
description:
You are an agent with a mission: make tomorrow's big play FLOP! ...Not sure why, boss gets some weird ideas every once in a while. Anyways.

Sneak around the theatre and complete various tasks to achieve your goal. But beware, guards patrol the building at all times. Do not get caught by them!

Main Graphics & Thumbnail by: Kynrico

Coding, Audio and Additional graphics by: JuhiX
